casebody.data:
Cynthia LOPEZ, an individual; and LBB Investments, LLC, a Wyoming limited liability company, Petitioners,
v.
The THIRD JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF LYON; and the Honorable Leon Aberasturi, District Judge, Respondents,
and
U.S. Bank National Association, as Indenture Trustee for Springleaf Mortgage Loan Trust 2013-1 ; Nationstar Mortgage, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company; National Default Servicing Corporation, an Arizona corporation; Solutionstar Holdings, LLC ; and Assurant Field Asset Services, Inc., a Texas corporation, Real Parties in Interest. No. 75656 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JUNE 15, 2018

DENIED.
